import datetime

from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField

    FINANCIAL_INSTITUTIONS_COMPANY, FINANCIAL_INSTITUTIONS_COMPANY_MENUS, CORE_COMPANY_MENUS, DATETIME_MINUTE_FORMAT
from utils.fen_and_yuan import fen_to_yuan

[文档]class CompanyListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """企业信息列表页"""

    company_name = serializers.CharField(source='name')  # 企业名称
    phone = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 注册手机号
    company_type = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 企业类型
    status = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 认证状态
    equity_type = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 权益类型


[文档]    def get_phone(self, obj):
        """返回手机号"""
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(id=obj.s1_user_id)
            return user.phone
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            return ""



[文档]    def get_company_type(self, obj):
        """获取企业类型"""
        tmp_dict = dict()
        tmp_dict['code'] = obj.company_type.name
        tmp_dict['name'] = obj.company_type.desc_name
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_status(self, obj):
        """获取企业认证状态"""
        tmp_dict = dict()
        if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
            status = obj.companyreviewlog.status
            tmp_dict['code'] = status
            status_choices_t = CompanyReviewLog.status_choices

            for one_tuple in status_choices_t:
                if status in one_tuple:
                    tmp_dict['name'] = one_tuple[1]
                    break
        else:
            tmp_dict['code'] = 'undo'
            tmp_dict['name'] = "未认证"
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    def get_equity_type(self, obj):
        """获取企业权益"""
        tmp_dict = dict()
        if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
            status = obj.companyreviewlog.status
            if status in ('undo', 'reject'):
                tmp_dict['code'] = 'no_equity'
                tmp_dict['name'] = "--"
            else:
                tmp_dict['code'] = obj.company_type.name
                tmp_dict['name'] = obj.company_type.desc_name + '权益'
        else:
            tmp_dict['code'] = 'no_equity'
            tmp_dict['name'] = "--"
        return tmp_dict



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Company
        fields = ['id', 'company_name', 'phone', 'company_type', 'created_at', 'status', 'equity_type']




[文档]class CompanyApprovalListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):

    reviewer = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 审核人

[文档]    def get_certification_apply_time(self, obj):
        """返回认证申请时间"""
        try:
            if hasattr(obj, "companyfile"):
                return obj.companyfile.created_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
            else:
                return "--"
        except:
            return "--"



[文档]    def get_audit_time(self, obj):
        """返回审核时间"""
        try:
            if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
                return obj.companyreviewlog.reviewed_at.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
        except:
            return "--"



[文档]    def get_reviewer(self, obj):
        """返回审核人"""
        try:
            if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
                u_id = obj.companyreviewlog.s1_user_id
                user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(id=u_id)
                return user.username
        except:
            return "--"

[文档]class CreditRetrieveSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    status_display = serializers.CharField(source="get_status_display")
    credit_type = serializers.IntegerField(write_only=True)  # 授信类型id
    credit_type_id = serializers.IntegerField(source="credit_type.id", read_only=True)  # 授信类型id
    credit_type_name = serializers.CharField(source="credit_type.desc_name", read_only=True)  # 授信类型名称
    receive_company_id = serializers.IntegerField(source="receive_company.id", read_only=True)  # 被授信企业id
    receive_company_name = serializers.CharField(source="receive_company.name", read_only=True)  # 被授信企业名称
    capital_company_id = serializers.IntegerField(source="capital_company.id", read_only=True)  # 资金机构id
    capital_company_name = serializers.CharField(source="capital_company.name", read_only=True)  # 资金机构名称
    quota_yuan = serializers.SerializerMethodField(read_only=True)  # 授信额度
    credit_clear_type_id = serializers.IntegerField(source="credit_clear_type.id", read_only=True)  # 清分方式id
    credit_clear_type_name = serializers.CharField(source="credit_clear_type.desc_name", read_only=True)  # 清分方式名称
    reject_opinion = serializers.SerializerMethodField(read_only=True)  # 驳回原因


[文档]    def get_quota_yuan(self, obj):
        return fen_to_yuan(obj.quota)



[文档]    def get_reject_opinion(self, obj):
        try:
            ret = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_id=obj.id,
                data_table="credit"
            ).first().opinion
        except Exception as err:
            ret = ""
        return ret

[文档]class CompanyApprovalDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """企业审核详情页序列化器"""

    audit_status = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 审核状态
    registered_capital = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 注册资本
    paid_in_capital = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 实缴资本
    management_address = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 经营地址
    company_file = CompanyFileSerializer(source='companyfile', default=dict())  # 企业相关附件
    approval_results = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 审批结果返回值
    bank_city = serializers.CharField(source='bank_city.name', default='--')  # 开户行所在市



[文档]    def get_audit_status(self, obj):
        """获取审核状态"""
        if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
            status = obj.companyreviewlog.status
            if status == 'undo':
                return '待审核'
            else:
                return '已审核'
        else:
            return "--"



[文档]    def get_registered_capital(self, obj):
        """返回注册资本,千分位展示"""
        if obj.registered_capital:
            return "{:,}".format(obj.registered_capital)
        else:
            return '--'



[文档]    def get_paid_in_capital(self, obj):
        """返回实缴资本,千分位展示"""
        if obj.paid_in_capital:
            return "{:,}".format(obj.paid_in_capital)
        else:
            return '--'



[文档]    def get_management_address(self, obj):
        """获取经营地址"""
        county_obj = obj.county
        if county_obj:
            county_name = county_obj.name
            city_obj = City.objects.filter(id=county_obj.city_id).first()
            city_name = city_obj.name
            province_obj = Province.objects.filter(id=city_obj.province_id).first()
            province_name = province_obj.name
            return province_name + city_name + county_name
        else:
            return '--'



[文档]    def get_approval_results(self, obj):
        """审批状态及意见"""
        approval_dict = {"status": "", "opinion": ""}
        if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog"):
            status = obj.companyreviewlog.status
            if status == 'reject':
                approval_dict['status'] = "驳回"
                approval_dict['opinion'] = obj.companyreviewlog.opinion
            else:
                approval_dict['status'] = "同意"
                approval_dict['opinion'] = obj.companyreviewlog.opinion
        return approval_dict

[文档]class CompanyReviewLogSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):

    opinion = serializers.CharField(required=False, default='')  # opinion 非必填项


[文档]    def create_role(self, platform_id: int) -> dict:
        """创建公司的role

        :param int platform_id: 平台id
        :return dict: {role_name: role_id}
        """
        ready_roles = [
            Role(
                name=role_info['name'],
                desc=role_info['desc_name'],
                platform_id=platform_id,
                company_id=self.context.get('company_id'),
                disable=role_info['disable']
            )
            for role_info in ROLE_LIST
        ]
        # django3.2之后的文档上说bulk_create返回值是按照传入顺序的obj list, 但是2.2没有
        roles = Role.objects.bulk_create(ready_roles)
        return {role.name: role.pk for role in roles}



[文档]    def create_user_role(self, s1_user_id: int, role_id: int):
        """关联用户角色

        :param int s1_user_id: 公司的user_id
        :param int role_id: 角色id
        """
        UserRole.objects.create(s1_user_id=s1_user_id, role_id=role_id)



[文档]    def permission_type_get(self, company_type):
        if company_type not in (CORE_COMPANY, NORMAL_COMPANY, FINANCIAL_INSTITUTIONS_COMPANY):
            raise APIException('企业类型不对,请检查!')
        menu_type_list = []
        if company_type == CORE_COMPANY:  # 核心企业
            menu_type_list = CORE_COMPANY_MENUS

        if company_type == NORMAL_COMPANY:  # 一般企业
            menu_type_list = NORMAL_COMPANY_MENUS

        if company_type == FINANCIAL_INSTITUTIONS_COMPANY:  # 资金机构
            menu_type_list = FINANCIAL_INSTITUTIONS_COMPANY_MENUS

        return menu_type_list



[文档]    def create_role_app_menus(self, roles_info, company_type):
        batch_create_list = []
        menu_type_list = self.permission_type_get(company_type)
        menu_list = [key.get('code')[0] for key in menu_type_list]
        id_menu_list = list(AppMenus.objects.filter(code__in=menu_list).values('id', 'code'))  # 获取id与code的对应关系

        for const_key in menu_type_list:
            code = const_key.get('code')[0]
            for table_key in id_menu_list:
                if table_key.get('code') == code:
                    table_key['role'] = const_key.get('role')
                    break

        # 此时 id_menu_list的值类似 [{'id': 16, 'code': 'credit_manage', 'role': ("founder", "handler")},...]

        # 先后处理 创建人,管理员,经办人及审核人角色的数据
        for munes_dict in id_menu_list:
            role_type = munes_dict.get('role')
            if 'founder' in role_type:
                founder_ret = RoleAppMenus(role_id=roles_info['founder'], app_menus_id=munes_dict.get('id'))
                batch_create_list.append(founder_ret)

            if 'administrator' in role_type:
                administrator_ret = RoleAppMenus(role_id=roles_info['administrator'], app_menus_id=munes_dict.get('id'))
                batch_create_list.append(administrator_ret)

            if "handler" in role_type:
                handler_ret = RoleAppMenus(role_id=roles_info['handler'], app_menus_id=munes_dict.get('id'))
                batch_create_list.append(handler_ret)

            if "reviewer" in role_type:
                reviewer_ret = RoleAppMenus(role_id=roles_info['reviewer'], app_menus_id=munes_dict.get('id'))
                batch_create_list.append(reviewer_ret)

        # 批量创建数据操作
        RoleAppMenus.objects.bulk_create(batch_create_list)



[文档]    def update(self, instance, validated_data):
        with transaction.atomic():
            status = validated_data.get('status')
            # 修改审批表的部分字段
            instance.status = status
            instance.s1_user_id = validated_data.get('s1_user_id')
            instance.reviewed_at = validated_data.get('reviewed_at')
            instance.opinion = validated_data.get('opinion', '')
            instance.save(update_fields=['status', 's1_user_id', 'reviewed_at', 'opinion', 'updated_at'])

            # 获取当前企业的信息
            company_id = self.context.get('company_id')
            company_obj = Company.objects.filter(id=company_id).select_related(
                'county', 'company_type', 'companyreviewlog',
            ).first()
            serializer = CompanyApprovalDetailSerializer(company_obj)
            snapshot_info = serializer.data  # 获取企业详情信息
            instance.snapshot = snapshot_info
            instance.save(update_fields=['snapshot', 'updated_at'])

            # 审核通过才进行下面操作;
            if status == 'pass':
                # 获取平台数据id
                platform_obj = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_CLIENT).only('id').first()
                platform_id = platform_obj.pk

                # 往role表插入数据;
                roles_info = self.create_role(platform_id)

                # 往user_role表里插入一条数据,需要是创建人的role_id
                self.create_user_role(company_obj.s1_user_id, roles_info['founder'])

                # 往role_app_menus表里插入数据,各角色对应的三级菜单;
                self.create_role_app_menus(roles_info, company_obj.company_type.name)

            return instance



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CompanyReviewLog
        fields = ['status', 's1_user_id', 'reviewed_at', 'opinion']




[文档]class CreditExamineSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    授信审批序列化器
    """


[文档]    def update(self, instance, validated_data):
        request = self.context["request"]

        with transaction.atomic():

            if not instance.status == "undo":
                raise APIException("该数据已审批")

            instance.status = request.data.get("result")
            instance.save()
            detail_ser = CreditRetrieveSerializer(instance)  # 获取快照信息
            ReviewLog.objects.create(
                opinion=request.data["opinion"],  # 审批意见
                enclosure=request.data["enclosure"],  # 附件
                data_id=instance.id,  # 数据id
                data_table="credit",  # 数据表
                result=request.data.get("result"),
                handle_status="done",  # 处理状态
                review_at=datetime.datetime.now(),  # 审核时间
                s1_user_id=request.user.id,  # 操作人id
                node="一级审批",  # 审核节点,
                snapshot=detail_ser.data
            )
        return instance



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Credit
        fields = ["id"]

[文档]    def get_s1_user(self, instance):
        """
        获取用户名
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(pk=instance.s1_user_id)
            return user.nick_name
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            return ""

[文档]class CreditMangeListSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """授信管理-授信管理列表页"""
    receive_company = serializers.CharField(source="receive_company.name")
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source='capital_company.name')
    status = serializers.CharField(source='get_status_display')
    quota = FenToYuanFloatField()
    available_quota = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 可用额度
    total_used_quota = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 已用额度
    available_days = serializers.SerializerMethodField()  # 剩余有效期(天)

    # 返回值新增字段
    # 授信协议编号(agreement_no), 可用额度, 已用额度, 剩余有效期


[文档]    def get_available_quota(self, obj):
        """
        获取可用额度
        :param obj:
        :return: 可用额度(元)
        """
        return fen_to_yuan(obj.available_quota)



[文档]    def get_total_used_quota(self, obj):
        """
        获取已用额度
        :param obj:
        :return: 已用额度(元)
        """

        return fen_to_yuan(obj.total_used_quota)



[文档]    def get_available_days(self, obj):
        """
        获取剩余有效期(天)
        :param obj:
        :return: 剩余有效期(天)
        """

        now_time = datetime.date.today()  # 当前时间
        start = obj.start  # 授信开始日期
        end = obj.end  # 授信结束日期

        # 有效期天数计算 prd文档有相关说明
        can_use_day = 0
        if start <= now_time <= end:
            can_use_day = (end - now_time).days

        if now_time > end:
            can_use_day = 0

        if now_time < start:
            can_use_day = (end - start).days + 1

        return can_use_day
